abstract.para: Any question about mod-xslt? Problems? Would you like to know more about what the future holds? Any feature you would like to have? Join the mailing list.

Remember that you don't need to create a new gamil account if you don't want to, you can still use your normal mailbox. The account is used so you have a username and password to access the web interface, change your settings, or post via web, like with mailman, sympa or any other mailing list.
don't want a google account? prefer to do this over email? send an email to: mailto:mod-xslt+subscribe@googlegroups.com.
To access the web archives, you can visit
To send an email, just write to mod-xslt@googlegroups.com.
If you want to contribute code, feature, bugfixes, ... the mailing list is the right place where to start.
